name: The Academy of Mana Science
description:
Welcome to the entrance exam to the Academy of Mana Science! 

Today marks the first step towards unlocking the secrets of magic. Learn how the various mana elements interact with each other, and use them to craft powerful spells!

This is a minimalist puzzle game between chemistry and magic. Combine elements and builds structures to create spells. 

A game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in 48h.

Music by Purrple Cat | https://purrplecat.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
